item.description:
Hi All,

These are 2 lovely races for anyone that wants a Labor Day Monday long run. For the 25k, don't be put off by the distance, this is a fantastic course that can be ran at any pace and is only just over 1/2 marathon distance...

Here's the 7k option details - http://www.northshore...

Here's the 25k option details -
http://www.northshore...

A few of us have done if for the last couple of years and the course is great.

Please be sure to answer yes on here and whether you're willing to car pool!

Excellent, thanks!

~ Martin


p.s. this is a public event and you're responsible for your own registration, fees and safety etc.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a blue Nike tanktop (that's me in the photo on the left from last year!)

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: North Shore Road Race Series - "Cape Ann" 25K / "Run the Goose" 7K
